## [corrmorant: Flexible Correlation Matrices Based on ggplot2](https://github.com/r-link/corrmorant)

Added Jun 6th, 2021

**What is this?**

**Excerpt from site:** corrmorant extends ggplot2 by an automated framework for plots of correlation matrices that can be easily modified via regular ggplot2 syntax.
In addition, it provides a large set of visualization tools for exploratory data analysis based on correlation matrices.

1.  Link to package here: <https://github.com/r-link/corrmorant>
